alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Phillips County through 1000 PM MDT... At 927 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hays, or near Zortman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zortman and Landusky. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northeastern Montana.
